hero.title: Character Analysis Mapping Method
hero.subtitle: Based on Characterology and BodyMind Integration
hero.description: Join thousands who have transformed their lives through our proven 8-week character development program led by expert coach Claudia Fisher.

manifest.title: Manifest
manifest.p1:
There comes a moment in every journey…
when performance no longer satisfies.
When pleasing others becomes too heavy.
When the stories we tell ourselves no longer make sense.
manifest.p2:
That moment is not a crisis.
It's a calling.

character_analysis.title: Character Analysis Mapping Session
character_analysis.description: A foundational 1-on-1 session to understand your character structure through BodyMind Integration.

vagus_nerve.title: Vagus Nerve Reset + EFT + Aromatherapy
vagus_nerve.description: A calming session combining nervous system regulation, tapping therapy, and sensory healing.

master_key.title: Character Analysis Mapping Method master key package
master_key.description: Deep-dive mentorship using the Character Analysis Mapping Method, emotional mastery & life design.

nutrition.title: Nutrition Beyond the Plate
nutrition.description: Explore emotional eating, survival traits, and the hunger that food can't touch.

what_to_expect.title: What You Can Expect
what_to_expect.description: Each consultation is a one-on-one guided experience where we explore your unique psychological and physical patterns through the Character Analysis Mapping Method.
what_to_expect.gain1: A deeper understanding of your emotional and behavioral patterns
what_to_expect.gain3: Tools to support personal transformation and self-awareness

reflections.title: Client Reflections
reflections.quote1: For the first time, I felt truly seen—not just my behaviors, but what was underneath.
reflections.quote2: The mapping session helped me make sense of patterns I've struggled with for years.
reflections.quote3: I've learned to be kinder to myself, and that has changed everything.

manifest.title: Manifest

opening.line1: There comes a moment in every journey…
opening.line3: When pleasing others becomes too heavy.
opening.line4: When the stories we tell ourselves no longer make sense.

manifest.not_crisis: That moment is not a crisis.
manifest.calling_to_strip: A calling to strip the armor,
manifest.meet_version: to finally meet the version of you that's been waiting —
manifest.not_fixed: not to be fixed, but to be seen.
manifest.essence_unveiled: Essence Unveiled is not about perfection, fixing, or becoming someone else.
manifest.remembering_self: It's about remembering the self that was always there — before the fear, before the masks, before the shoulds.
manifest.transformation_space: This is a space for transformation that begins within.
manifest.through_analysis: Through Character Analysis, body intelligence, and emotional integration,
manifest.reconnect_truth: you are invited to reconnect with the truth beneath the defenses.
manifest.essence_not_build: Because your essence is not something you need to build.
manifest.born_with: It's something you were born with.
manifest.time_to_live: Now it's time to live from it.

char_analysis.title: Character Analysis Mapping Session
char_analysis.description1: A foundational 1-on-1 session to understand your character structure through BodyMind Integration.
char_analysis.description2: Discover the blueprint of your emotional patterns and unlock the wisdom your body holds about who you truly are.

cta.title: Begin Your Journey
cta.description: Start with a foundational understanding of your character structure.

vagus.title: Vagus Nerve Reset + EFT + Aromatherapy
vagus.description1: A calming session combining nervous system regulation, tapping therapy, and sensory healing.
vagus.description2: Experience deep relaxation and nervous system reset through this integrated healing approach.

cta.title: Reset & Restore
cta.description: Experience profound nervous system healing and regulation.

footer.description: Transform your character and unlock your true potential with proven coaching methods.
